nav.SubTitle: Standard two-way dozer blade features advanced design

frame.nav: The dozer blade design, coupled with its high capacity is great for performing light to medium finish work, site preparation or cleanup.
Exterior lighting makes it easy to see work during the low light of evening or early morning hours.
Adds maneuverability to the zero tail swing design when working in confined areas.
Operating levers are conveniently positioned and foot rests provide comfortable support when operating the machine. Two-speed control is conveniently located on travel lever.
The tilt-operated safety lever lock disengages the attachment, boom swing and travel functions to prevent accidental operation when entering/leaving cab.
The certified ROPS/FOPS canopy provides roll-over protection, shields the operator from falling debris or objects and provides shelter from sun and rain.
Standard rubber tracks minimize damage to multiple surfaces, including asphalt, concrete and turf, and reduce noise.
With the zero tail swing design, this excavator can move and work in tight spaces without damaging the machine or the job site.
The straight propel system keeps machine on straight course, even during multiple operations.
Easy daily maintenance through large swing-out side panels.
Easy daily maintenance through large swing-out side panels.
